articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Defence Unit on Ryo Islet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Defence Unit on Ryo Islet
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, inspected a unit on Ryo Islet defending a forward post on the east coast.
					He gave the 4th Company and the 3rd Company of the Coastal Artillery Battalion under the unit binoculars and automatic rifles as souvenirs and had a photo session with service personnel of the defence unit and their families.
					
					He went round firepower apparatuses watched by leader Kim Jong Il before visiting the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					Seeing one by one the precious historic data on the undying leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he looked back with deep emotion on the proud course covered by the defence unit.
					
					At a military lecture room, he praised the defence unit for preparing the commanding and staff officers as able ones by successfully building the military lecture room and organizing an effective training for them. 
					
					Going round the service personnel's hall and library, he learned about the political and ideological education of them.
					
					He climbed a command and watch post on top of a mountain along a hillside road which was so steep that the car had to be pushed to reach there due to thaw.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the commanding officers and soldiers of the defence unit have consolidated Ryo Islet to be a fortress standing invulnerable even in face of any enemy's surprise invasion and fire strike.
					
					Feasting his eyes on a vast defence theatre of which the defence unit is in charge, he stressed the need to consolidate Ryo Islet, the gateway in the East Sea, as firm as an iron wall in order not to allow the enemy to invade the socialist country under any circumstances. He, at the same time, ordered the unit to send all the intruders into the bottom of the sea.
					
					He went round the service personnel's health complex, non-staple foodstuff store, vegetable greenhouse and other supply service facilities run by the defence unit itself. He underlined the need to continue directing big efforts to supply service so that the service personnel there may not be nostalgic for the life on the land.
					
					Making the rounds of the company and the coastal battery under the unit, he paid deep attention to the living of the service personnel.
					
					He guided the training in firearms at the coast artillery emplacement visited by Kim Jong Il and had a photo session with soldiers, holding their shoulders in his arms.
					
					He highly appreciated the achievements performed by the unit in the past period, noting that the unit honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment is a model in all aspects including combat and political training, supply service and unit command and management.
					
					He highly appreciated the efforts made by Hero of the Republic Chon Jae Gwon while serving as commander of the unit for 25 years and reposed deepest trust in Chon by saying that there should be by his side such officers as Chon.
					
					He got aboard the warship to sail despite rough waves, telling the commanding officers that he entrusted the defence of Ryo Islet to them and wishing them good health and greater success in rounding off the combat preparations.
					
					He was accompanied by KPA Generals Kim Won Hong and Hyon Chol Hae, KPA Lieut. Generals Ri Tu Song and Ri Jong Mu.

articles.title: WPK and DPRK's Independent Foreign Policy Supported
articles.content:
WPK and DPRK's Independent Foreign Policy Supported
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni met the delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Vice-Chairwoman Hong Son Ok participating in the 126th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union at the Presidential Palace on April 1.
					The president wished Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, good health and greater success in his work, and asked the head of the delegation to convey warm greetings to him.
					
					The president expressed deep condolences over the death of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					He said he was rejoiced over the great successes made in the DPRK under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					He fully supported the independent foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.
					
					On the same day, the speaker of Ugandan parliament had a talk with the delegation of the DPRK SPA.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of S. HQ of Pomminryon Meets Members of N. HQ
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of S. HQ of Pomminryon Meets Members of N. HQ
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, met with Chairman Choe Jin Su and officials of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Wednesday.
					Officials of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon said that Ro Su Hui expressed the faith and will of the south Korean people to hold in high esteem leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal father of the nation by participating in the memorial for commemorating the 100th day since his demise.
					
					They noted that Ro's visit is patriotic deed that contributed to preserving and implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration, its practical programme.
					
					They extended full support and solidarity to the members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and patriotic people who are carrying on the struggle for democracy of the society and the reunification of the country while smashing the treacherous and anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. 
					
					Ro Su Hui said that the compatriots in the north warmly welcomed him with compatriotic feelings.
					
					He called for strengthening the alliance among the south, the north and abroad sides of Pomminryon for implementing the south-north joint declarations and thus contributing to opening up a new phase of independent reunification.

articles.title: Reception for Chinese Delegation in DPRK
articles.content:
Reception for Chinese Delegation in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for the visiting delegation of the diplomatic officials of the Chinese People's Liberation Army on Wednesday.
					Present on invitation were members of the delegation led by Major General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, and staff of the military attache office of the Chinese embassy in the DPRK including Zhang Ping, military, navy and air attache. 
					
					The general and other officers of the Korean People's Army were also present there.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of diplomatic officials of the Chinese People's Liberation Army led by Major General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Art Group of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Art Group of Koreans in China Here
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- An art group of Koreans in China arrived here by air on Wednesday to attend the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: World Conference on Juche Idea to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
World Conference on Juche Idea to Be Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The International Preparatory Committee of the World Conference on the Juche Idea and the DPRK Preparatory Committee of the World Conference on the Juche Idea Wednesday announced that they would convene the World Conference on the Juche Idea. 
					The conference on the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and carrying forward its cause will be held in Pyongyang on April 12 and 13, the announcement said, adding:
					
					Prominent personages of political and social circles, delegates of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the groups for the study of the Juche idea in continents and countries as well as Juche idea followers from around the world will participate in the conference.
					
					The conference will review the feats of world historical significance the President and leader Kim Jong Il performed in realizing the Korean revolution and global independence by founding the Juche idea and developing it in depth. It will also discuss theoretical and practical problems arising in opposing imperialism and achieving global independence and peace and independent development of countries and nations as well as in building a peaceful, prosperous and new society with the Juche idea as guidelines.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Festival to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Festival to Be Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological festival is to be opened at the Three-Revolution Exhibition between late April and early May to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					It will be sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. 
					
					The festival will be participated in by scientific research and education institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms and other units as well as scientists, technicians, teachers, workers, farmers, members of Three-Revolution teams and officials.
					
					They will hear papers introducing sci-tech achievements and experience highly appreciated at local festivals.
					
					The festival will also involve group and individual public presentations of sci-tech achievements and lectures on latest science and technology, services for intellectual interchange, different kinds of technological services for ultra-modern products and display competition.
					
					Its participants will have an opportunity to swap sci-tech achievements and experience gained in production and technological updating in the vanguard sectors of the national economy and the fields of basic industry, light industry and agriculture.
					
					During the festival, there will be a national review of competitions in  technical innovations among the April 15 Technical Innovation Shock Brigades for Winning Silk Banners commemorating the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (19)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (19)
Kim Il Sung Enriches Juche Idea
					
					Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- In the 1970s, the situation urgently called for expounding in an overall way the profound principles and contents of the Juche idea and developing it in depth.
					
					In order to press ahead with socialist construction in Korea, it was needed to imbue all members of society with the Juche idea and transform all realms of society as required by this idea. 
					
					And, the world's Juche idea followers were visiting the DPRK to learn more about the idea.
					
					Under this situation President Kim Il Sung made public celebrated works one after another to further enrich the Juche idea. The works included "On the Present Political and Economic Policies of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and Some International Problems", answers to questions raised by newsmen of the Japanese newspaper Yomiuri Shimbun in January Juche 61 (1972), "On Some Problems of Our Party's Juche Idea and the Government of the Republic's Internal and External Policies", answers to questions raised by journalists of the Japanese newspaper Mainichi Shimbun in September 1972 and "On the Occasion of the 30th Anniversary of the Foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					In the works he gave in-depth and scientific exposition of the essence of the Juche idea and expounded on a scientific basis the philosophical principles and socio-historical principles of the idea.
					
					In a nutshell, the Juche idea clarifies that the masters of the revolution and construction are the popular masses and that they are also the motive force of the revolution and construction. In other words, one is responsible for one's own destiny and one has also the capacity for hewing out one's own destiny.
					
					He also defined it as the principles for embodying the Juche idea in the revolution and construction to establish Juche in ideology, independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in defence.
					
					In this way he enriched the Juche idea and developed it into an integrated system, thus making it serve as the greatest idea in the human history of thought and as the most scientific guiding idea for the revolution and construction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fabrication of "North Wind" Slammed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fabrication of "North Wind" Slammed: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group kicked up the "north wind" full of falsity, deception, fabrication and plots ahead of the forthcoming "National Assembly" election. Its ulterior aim is to turn the south Korean society into a theater of rowdyism for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK, turn the table in its favor occasioned by the NA election and tide over the crisis.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article:
					
					The Lee group's fabrication of the "north wind" reveals the inveterate habits of the group obsessed by sycophantic treachery and confrontation with compatriots. It is a trick to suppress and stamp out the progressive forces and maintain its fascist system of dictatorship, the paper says, and goes on;
					
					The Lee group is busying pulling up the DPRK over its planned artificial satellite launch for peaceful purposes, asserting that it is aimed to "develop a means for the long-distance delivery of nuclear weapons".
					
					Conservative media, dancing to the tune of the puppet authorities' propaganda of confrontation with the DPRK, are insisting that the DPRK's working satellite is aimed "to put pressure upon the south before the general election" and the like.  This clearly proves the sinister intention of the group of traitors to turn the forthcoming NA election and "presidential election" into a theatre of rowdyism for escalating confrontation with compatriots while steadily keeping up fabrication of the "north wind".
					
					Serious indeed are the harmful impacts the south Korean ruling forces have on the country and the nation through the conspiratorial fabrication of the "north wind".
					
					However, it is pie in the sky for the Lee group to try to get something in the "north wind".
					
					The "north wind" can no longer become an amulet for the conservative group. 
					
					The more the south Korean conservative authorities become persistent in relying on the anti-DPRK campaign, the more clearly their treacherous nature and weakness will be disclosed.
					
					The puppet forces' fabrication of the "north wind" is an unpardonable mockery and insult to the south Korean people aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification and a new politics and new life.

articles.title: Illegal Investigation of Civilians in S. Korea Censured: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Illegal Investigation of Civilians in S. Korea Censured: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- An illegal investigation of civilians, serious human rights abuse, escalated into social and political issue in south Korea as the truth about the investigation was brought to light in recent days and this is the results of the just struggle waged by the masses against Lee Myung Bak and "Saenuri Party", says Rodong Sinmun of the DPRK in a bylined commentary on Wednesday.
					It goes on:
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group put the whole of south Korea under a tight surveillance network to back its fascist dictatorial rule with illegal investigation of civilians. It stretched out its tentacles of suppression to civilians by monitoring their every movement.
					
					It is as clear as noonday that the general cleanup of the progressive presspersons and public officials, all sorts of suspicions about the personages of the preceding "government" were the results of the illegal investigation of the civilians.
					
					It is quite natural that not only broad segments of south Koreans but the opposite parties are demanding thorough probe into the truth behind the recent case and impeachment against traitor Lee Myung Bak, saying that the case was cooked up by Lee Myung Bak in every respect. 
					
					Much upset by the disclosure of the truth about the illegal investigation of civilians amid the serious ruling crisis caused by the whole gamut of crimes they committed after coming to office, the Lee Myung Bak and "Saenuri Party" are busy resorting to a trick to evade the public judgment. 
					
					Every fabric of the south Korean society, however, is calling traitor Lee Myung Bak "a body and head" of the case and Park Geun Hye a conspirator who "kept mum and backed it". Irony is that Park, in cahoots with Lee, called for a special inspection only to be jeered by the public as an advanced trick to evade the responsibility.
					
					The reality clearly proves that Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye group is made up of fascist dictators, hooligans and human rights abusers who put the "Yusin" dictatorship into the shade.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppress Demonstrators against Naval Base
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppress Demonstrators against Naval Base
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The puppet police of south Korea on Sunday walked away members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and civic and social organizations who were staging demonstrations on Jeju Island against the construction of a naval base, according to KBS of south Korea.
					The riot police went on the rampage, throwing tear liquid to demonstrators who attempted to enter the construction site.

articles.title: Illegal Investigation of Civilians Rejected by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Illegal Investigation of Civilians Rejected by S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Federation for Democratic Press of south Korea made public a commentary denouncing the puppet Lee Myung Bak regime for its illegal investigation of civilians on March 31.
					The fact was disclosed via media that the Lee Myung Bak regime put the whole society under the surveillance network and illegally investigated people of all strata, the commentary said.
					
					It is shocking that all fabrics of the society including the trade unions members and public officials as well as the presspersons became the target of surveillance, it said, and went on:
					
					Chongwadae played all sorts of tricks to cover it up and the prosecution and the ruling party cooperated with it only to touch off greater criticism.
					
					The authorities are now hatching plots to suppress the presspersons who disclosed the authorities' crimes.
					
					The commentary said that this will offer an opportunity of awakening the public to the true colors of the present authorities which hoodwink people and stop their ears to deceive them.
					
					Lee Myung Bak had better resign his post now if he does not want to meet a miserable end, it warned.

articles.title: Young Koreans in Japan Call for Judgment of S. Korean Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Young Koreans in Japan Call for Judgment of S. Korean Group of Traitors
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Youth League in Japan held the first session of the 25th Central Committee of the league in Nagoya City of Japan on March 18 in which it called for the judgment of the south Korean group of traitors.
					The action program of the organization was made public.
					
					The organization said it will launch active information activities to lay bare the unpopular rule by the Lee regime and the "Saenuri Party."
					
					It underscored the need to conduct positive activities targeting the judgment of anti-reunification confrontation regime.
					
					Mun Se Hyon, chairman of the south Korean Youth League in Japan, Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Federation of the south Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification, and other speakers denounced the Lee regime for pushing the inter-Korean relations to an extreme pitch of tension through its anti-DPRK confrontation policy.
					
					It is important to set up "government" for peace and reunification in south Korea, they said, appealing to the young Koreans in different parts of Japan to carry on a dynamic struggle in response to the call of the nation.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Accused of Cutting Subsidies for Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Accused of Cutting Subsidies for Korean Schools
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Osaka Prefecture of Japan recently decided not to give 2011 subsidies to the Korean schools in the prefecture.
					A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday terms the Japanese authorities' politically-motivated handling of the sacred education issue a hysteric act of ultra-right conservative elements engrossed in hostility toward the DPRK. 
					
					The Japanese authorities criticized the work of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), finding fault with Korean school students who visited the homeland to attend events, says the commentary, adding it is far-fetched accusation to find an excuse for cutting subsidies for Korean schools in Japan. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries' acts are aimed to discriminate national education of Korean residents in Japan and burden them with heavy tuition fee and thus obliterate the national education of Chongryon, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The facts prove what a dangerous stage the Japanese reactionaries' long-running crackdown on Chongryon has reached.
					
					Mayor of Osaka City Hashimoto, when governing the Osaka Prefecture last year, thwarted tuition aid to Korean schools, saying he can not allow funding any institution that has relation with the "illegal state", regardless of whether it is a school under the pretext of "political principle". He even said that he will separately deal with Korean schools though the government includes them in the tuition-waiver program. 
					
					To violate the sacred right to education being obsessed with chauvinistic stand to Korean nation is an act against humanity and a breach of international law. 
					
					It amounts to crime of fanning up hostility toward the DPRK in the Japanese society and making Korean children victims of the unjust political suppression. 
					
					It is only the Japanese politicians in the world who take politically-motivated approach towards the issue of education.

articles.title: Reunification Concert Given by Korean-Americans in New York
articles.content:
Reunification Concert Given by Korean-Americans in New York
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Uruk Symphony Orchestra, an art group of Koreans in the United States, gave its 100th reunification concert in New York on Saturday.
					The concert began with orchestral music "Song of General Kim Il Sung", immortal revolutionary hymn, and "We Pledge", fourth movement of Symphony "The Leader Is Always with Us".
					
					It sang high praises of the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on behalf of the times, history and national reunification.
					
					Concerto for violin "Nostalgia", immortal masterpiece, and orchestral music "Footsteps" were highly applauded by the audience. 
					
					Solo "My Dear Motherland" and other numbers which reflected the Koreans' patriotism and desire for reunification caught the particular interest of the audience,
					
					Among the audience were Korean residents in the U.S., members of the DPRK permanent mission at the UN, diplomatic envoys of many countries and other foreigners.

articles.title: Title of Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Il Sung in Nigeria
articles.content:
Title of Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Il Sung in Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Damaturu City, Yobe State of Nigeria awarded the title of honorary citizenship to President Kim Il Sung on the centenary of his birth.
					A ceremony for conveying the title took place at the presidential guesthouse on March 27.
					
					Present there were personages of the Administration of Damaturu City, Yobe State of Nigeria and members of the DPRK technical cooperation group working in the country.
					
					The administrative governor said that it is the greatest honor and happiness to award the title of honorary citizenship to the President on the centenary of his birth. 
					
					The certificate of honorary citizenship to the President was conveyed to the head of the DPRK group.
					
					It said that the government of Damaturu City awards the title of honorary citizenship to President Kim Il Sung on the centenary of his birth on behalf of all the citizens.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in France
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was published in pamphlet with due ceremony on March 26 by the Democrat Publishing House in France.
					The work, published on September 7, 1981, clarifies that adhering to independence in the activities of the party and state is the requirement of the times, and that the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.

articles.title: Joint Seminar on Feats of Kim Il Sung Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Joint Seminar on Feats of Kim Il Sung Held in Mongolia
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the subject of "President Kim Il Sung's feats will be immortal" was held in Mongolia on March 29 on the anniversary of the birth of Kim Il Sung.
					On display in its venue were works of the peerlessly great persons and photos of their undying exploits.
					
					Present there were personages of the Mongolian People's Party and its affiliated youth federation, women's union and students' federation, the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche and the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun and popular masses.
					
					Present there on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Ulan Bator.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					The seminar dealt with the feats the President performed by founding the Juche idea and embodying it in the revolution and construction and devoting his all to the liberation of the country, freedom and happiness of the people and national reunification.
					
					A message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: 100 Year-long History of Kim Il Sung's Korea Praised by Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
100 Year-long History of Kim Il Sung's Korea Praised by Mexican Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on March 27 in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					100 years since the President was born were great years to be specially recorded in history, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					The President waged the anti-Japanese armed struggle by relying on the strength of the popular masses in the grim situation in which there were neither state backing nor support by the regular army, thereby defeating Japanese imperialism and liberating Korea.
					
					Under his leadership the Korean people won the historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' aggression.
					
					Thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the outstanding brilliant commander of Songun, the political and military offensives of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle socialist Korea ended in fiasco.
					
					Today the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an invincible military power and socialist fortress being possessed of a powerful nuclear deterrent no formidable enemies dare provoke.
					
					The world was surprised to hear the announcement by the DPRK that it will launch a working satellite on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of the President.
					
					The Korean people are registering world-startling achievements in economic construction.
					
					We wish the dear respected Kim Jong Un great successes in his work of leading the Korean people in the struggle to implement the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Great Sun in Era of Independence: British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Great Sun in Era of Independence: British Organization
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on March 22 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "The great sun in era of independence" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					Progressive mankind is significantly greeting the centenary of the birth of the President with deep thanks and profound reverence for him, the great pioneer in the era of independence, the article said.
					
					As was done every year, this year, too, preparatory committees for commemorating his birth anniversary were formed in different regions and countries and colorful events are scheduled to take place with splendor, it noted. 
					
					Foreign media are carrying special write-ups praising his undying career and feats every day, it said.
					
					The President was the distinguished leader of mankind who rendered distinguished services to realizing global independence through his outstanding leadership till the last moments of his great life, it said.
					
					There are many great men in human history but no one has enjoyed such high praises by all people even after his demise as the President, it noted.
					
					Indeed, the President was the eternal leader of mankind and tender-hearted father who performed the undying feats which will shine long in history by working heart and soul for global independence in the steadfast spirit of independence against imperialism and with firm faith in socialism, it added.
					
					The President, the distinguished great man produced by the 20th century, is always alive as the sun, enjoying boundless reverence of all people, it concluded.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Russia, Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Russia, Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups and Equatorial Guinea TV aired a special program in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					A Russian paper on March 28 carried an article titled "The centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung" with the portrait of a smiling President.
					
					The article said: Mankind is to greet before long the centenary of the birth of the President, the great activist in the 20th century and the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					He founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrillas, finally liberating Korea through his Songun revolutionary leadership and founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the first people's democratic state in the Orient.
					
					The U.S. imperialists suffered the bitterest defeat in the Korean War in the 1950s for the first time in history by the Korean People's Army and the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					In the postwar period he resolutely turned down outsiders' offer for entry into the Council for Mutual Economic Assistances and firmly maintained the line of building the independent national economy, thereby successfully realizing the historic task of industrialization in a matter of 14 years.
					
					The Russian paper Byvor on March 23 edited an article headlined "Undying feats of great man" with the portrait of a smiling President.
					
					It noted: The Korean people call April 15 "the Day of the Sun". They are commemorating this day looking back on the life and feats of the President.
					
					Equatorial Guinea TV on March 28 and 29 introduced the undying feats the President performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Poland
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Establishing Social Traits of Giving Importance to Military Affairs" was published in pamphlet by the Kawdruk Publishing House of Poland on March 28.
					The work, published on February 4, 1992, clarifies an issue on holding in a big way the military parade for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army to be held in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.  It also indicates tasks for strengthening the People's Army and establishing social traits of giving importance to the military affairs.

articles.title: Russian Organization Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Russian Organization Supports Korean People's Just Cause
Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Blagobeshensk, Russia, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea, at its regular meeting on March 27, discussed measures for voicing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just cause.
					At the meeting a reporter and speakers praised the immortal exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					They expressed belief that the Korean people would dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving socialist nation, rallied closer around the Party.
					
					They condemned the Lee Myung Bak puppet clique for straining the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the extremes with hysterical acts while staging big joint military exercises. They expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just cause for peace and stability on the peninsula.

articles.title: Sobre convocatoria de conferencia mundial sobre idea Juche
articles.content:
Sobre convocatoria de conferencia mundial sobre idea Juche
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio internacional y el comite preparatorio coreano para la conferencia mundial sobre la idea Juche hicieron publica el dia 4 la siguiente informacion:
					Tendra lugar los dias 12 y 13 en esta capital la conferencia mundial de la idea Juche sobre esta concebida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y la brillante continuacion de su causa.
					
					Tomaran parte en la ocasion las personalidades renombres de circulos politicos y sociales de varios paises de los 5 continentes, los delegados del instituto internacional de la idea Juche y las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche por continentes y paises y los adeptos a la idea Juche.
					
					El foro hara balance de las hazanas de talla mundial del Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas ante la revolucion coreana y la verificacion de la causa de la independencia del mundo al concebir y profundizar dicho pensamiento.
					
					Y se discutiran sobre los problemas teorico-practicos que se presentan en luchar contra el imperialismo, lograr la causa de la independencia del mundo, la paz y el desarrollo independiente de los paises y naciones y construir una nueva sociedad pacifica y prospera tomando por guia directriz la idea Juche.

articles.title: Tendra lugar festival nacional de ciencia y tecnica por 15 de abril
articles.content:
Tendra lugar festival nacional de ciencia y tecnica por 15 de abril
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Bajo el auspicio del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea, tendra lugar de finales de abril a principios de mayo en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones el festival nacional de ciencia y tecnica en celebracion del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En la ocasion tomaran parte las instituciones de investigacion cientifica y docente, fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas y otras unidades, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, trabajadores, campesinos, miembros de grupos por las tres revoluciones y funcionarios.
					
					Y se daran a publicidad los exitos cientifico-tecnicos, evaluados en los festivales locales, y las experiencias.
					
					Tambien se realizara por entidades e individuales la publicacion de resultados cientifico-tecnicos, y habran la leccion sobre ciencias y tecnologias sofisticadas, el servicio de intercambio de productos intelectuales, el servicio tecnico de varios  productos de punta y la exposicion.
					
					Se intercambiaran los resultados cientifico-tecnicos y las experiencias logrados en la produccion y la renovacion tecnica en el sector de vanguardia de la economia nacional, el de industria basica, el de industria ligera y el de la agricultura. 
					
					Tambien  se hara balance sobre resultados de la competencia nacional de innovacion tecnica entre las brigadas para la innovacion tecnica 15 de abril por obtener la bandera roja con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung recibe titulo de ciudadano honorario de Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung recibe titulo de ciudadano honorario de Nigeria
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la ciudad de Damaturu del estado de Yobe de Nigeria le otorgo el titulo de ciudadano honorario.
					La ceremonia de entrega del certificado correspondiente tuvo lugar el dia 27 de marzo en la casa de huespedes del presidente.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades de la administracion urbana y los miembros de la delegacion de cooperacion tecnica de Corea que trabaja en ese pais africano.
					
					El alcalde de Damaturu dijo que el otorgamiento de la ciudadania honoraria a Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung con motivo de su centenario es un gran honor y maxima felicidad para el.
					
					Fue trasladado el certificado al jefe de la delegacion coreana.
					
					En el certificado se lee que en representacion de todos los ciudadanos, el gobierno de Damaturu otorga el titulo de ciudadano honorario al Presidente Kim Il Sung con motivo de dicha efemeride.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia invento de "oleada anti-Norte" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia invento de "oleada anti-Norte" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que en visperas de las "elecciones de asambleistas", la banda de Lee Myung Bak se enfrasca en levantar la "oleada anti-Norte" con enganos, fraudes e intrigas para cambiar la desfavorable situacion electoral y evadir la crisis, al fomentar en la sociedad surcoreana el clima conflictivo con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El invento de la "oleada anti-Norte" es un vicio cronico de los compinches de Lee Myung Bak, enloquecidos por el servilismo a grandes potencias y la confrontacion fratricida, y una artimana para mantener la dictadura fascista al reprimir y eliminar a las fuerzas progresistas, condena el diario y continua:
					
					Ahora, la banda de Lee cuestiona hasta el plan de lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la RPDC describiendolo como "desarrollo del medio de transporte de largo alcance de armas nucleares".
					
					Los medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea se suman a tal embuste de las autoridades informando que la RPDC lanza el satelite de usos practicos para "presionar a las autoridades surcoreanas con vistas a las elecciones generales".
					
					Esto deja conocer el sucio intento de la banda de traidores surcoreanos de continuar ampliando la "oleada anti-Norte" no solo para las "elecciones de asambleistas" sino hasta que lleguen las "elecciones presidenciales".
					
					Son muy graves las consecuencias negativas de la "oleada anti-Norte" que sufrieron el pais y la nacion.
					
					El invento de la "oleada anti-RPDC" es un insoportable insulto a los habitantes surcoreanos que aspiran a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion y demandan nueva politica y vida.

articles.title: AJDC denuncia investigacion ilegal de civiles en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
AJDC denuncia investigacion ilegal de civiles en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, el nuevo sindicato de la cadena surcoreana "KBS" publico cuantiosos documentos reveladores de que bajo la instruccion de Chongwadae (sede del ejecutivo), la sala para la ayuda etica de los funcionarios publicos de la Oficina del Premier cometio de modo indiscriminado de 2008 a 2010 la investigacion ilegal sobre distintos sectores y capas.
					Al conocerse el hecho, toda la extension surcoreana se ha convertido en una tribuna de criticas a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					El portavoz de la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea hizo publica el dia 3 una declaracion calificando ese caso estallado en el Sur de Corea como archi-crimen de violacion de derechos humanos organizado por el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak y el partido gobernante.
					
					El texto resumido de la nota sigue:
					
					Para mantener el "poder", la banda de Lee practico desde su llegada al poder la investigacion politica sobre las entidades progresistas del movimiento por la reunificacion, parlamentarios, jefes de organos publicos nombrados en los anteriores "regimenes", presidentes de principales medios de prensa, economistas, ministros y viceministros, etc.
					
					La politica de inteligencia y la violacion de DDHH de las autoridades surcoreanas fueron cometidas con el apoyo del partido en el poder.
					
					Park Geun-hye y otros tipejos del "Partido Saenuri" tomaron activa parte en encubrir la investigacion ilegal de civiles.
					
					Ellos recibieron de modo sistematico de las autoridades los registros de investigacion y los usaron para calumniar y atacar a los rivales politicos y los partidos opositores y no vacilaron en realizar escuchas ilegales sobre la oficina del representante de un partido opositor en la sede de la "Asamblea Nacional".
					
					Historicamente, los anteriores dictadores militares y fascistas practicaron tambien la politica de inteligencia tal como la investigacion ilegal de civiles.
					
					Pero, esa practica cobro mayor dimension en el mandato de la camarilla Lee Myung Bak - Park Geun-hye involucrando a Chongwadae, los aparatos de represion y el partido gobernante. Perplejos ante el creciente clima de enjuiciar al "poder" de Lee y al "Partido Saenuri" por el caso, los compinches de Lee andan con desesperacion para minimizar sus impactos mintiendo que la mayoria de documentos publicados esta vez son del anterior "regimen".  
					
					Mientras tanto, Park y el "Partido Saenuri" intentan librarse de la responsabilidad describiendose como "victimas" de la investigacion ilegal y diciendo que el caso es "una cuestion de ´Chongwadae´".
					
					Habria que recordar que el precursor de la investigacion politica ilegal es el "poder" del dictador de "renovacion" Park Chung Hee, padre de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Park Geun-hye y el "Partido Saenuri", organizacion residual de la epoca de "renovacion", deben ser enjuiciados severamente junto como Lee Myung Bak como autores principales del caso. 
					
					Sin embargo, el muy cinico binomio Lee-Park lanza ridiculamente la campana anti-RPDC cuestionando la situacion de DDHH.
					
					Claro esta que si los traidores de ese partido vuelven a tomar el "poder" y el control de la "Asamblea Nacional", el suelo coreano sera una sociedad obscura donde se violaran de la peor forma los DDHH y campeara el fascismo.
